channel.title: Automation on Wyatt Walsh
channel.description: Recent content in Automation on Wyatt Walsh

item.title: Fully Automated Data Pipeline Using Free, Cloud-Based Solutions
item.description: Overview Facilitated other’s sports-analytics data projects by creating the most robust, open-source, NBA-related database. Ensured $0 capital overhead requirements by using free cloud computing and dataset tools. Enabled better testing, deployment, and expansion by containerizing each pipeline segment’s Python scripts.
